chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Next we are going to solve our practice question no. 9

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: It says recreate the following form with suitable elements and input tags

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: We have read a lot of input types and elements of the form so we have a lot of information

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: and this is a very easy practice question

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's see our form, here some registration form is written on it

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: We can write H1, H2, H3 in any form

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's analyze what are the input types given to us

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: First name is a simple text input

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Last name is also a simple text input, both are on the same line

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: I know this is a drop down

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: How do I know it is a drop down? Because I can see an arrow here

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: and now we are in drop downs

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: How do we create drop downs in HTML?

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: We do it with the help of select tag and we give different options in it

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Now here it is written please select gender, so one option is male

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So let's assume one option will be male, one option will be female, one option we can give others

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So in this way we can give multiple options in drop down

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: After that what is on the next line?

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: On the next line, do you agree to all terms of service?

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: and here I have a check box

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So here I know I have to create a check box in the third line

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: and at last I have a button named register

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So we are using four different types of elements

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: One is text input, one is drop down, one is check box and one is button

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So we are going to create all of them one by one

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: First of all, we have to write the heading registration form

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So in our classroom.html file, I am going to delete all the forms that we have written earlier

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: First of all, I am going to make an h3 heading

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In that we will write registration form

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So let's save and refresh

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So registration form is up

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Now we will create a form

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's create a form

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's define action

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: action is equal to slash action

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: First of all, we are going to create two input elements

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: which will be of text type because I have to take the first and last name as input

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So I am going to add them in a div

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: First I am going to make input type equals text

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: I have also shown placeholder in this

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So I am going to add first name in placeholder

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's save and refresh

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So I have got the first name

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: And because we have already discussed that every input element should have a name attribute

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So I am going to give it fname which is basically first name

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In the same way, let's create another input

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: type is equal to text in placeholder

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Now last name will come

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's save and refresh

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So we have created the first line

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Now what we will do in the next div

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: For the drop down, first we will select

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's give it gender

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's give it id also

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: gender

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: And in select we are going to give options

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: This is my first option

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In first option, male is given

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In second option, we will make it female

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In third option, we will make it others

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: And along with that, as there are options

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So when we will submit data from options, we will not know the value

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So I have to define a value attribute

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In which I am going to write m

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In value attribute, I am going to write f

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Because value attribute can be small also

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Now along with that, I have to write some text

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So for that, let's create a label

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So for select, I am creating a label

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: For which id? For my gender id

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: What is written in the label?

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: It is written, please select gender

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's save and refresh

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So please select gender is here

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In drop down, male is here, female and others can be selected

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So I have multiple options

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Now let's see our third line

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In third line, I have to create a check box

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So to make a check box, first of all, I will ask my question

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Do you agree to all terms of service?

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: After that, we will create an input element

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: On which type we are going to write check box

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's give an id

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's give an id

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: And same thing

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's give in its name

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So my check box is created

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's save and refresh

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So here is the check box

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's give a label

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Label for my terms of service

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Agree

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's write yes I agree

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's save and refresh

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: As soon as I click on yes I agree, it will be checked

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So in this way, we have completed the third line of our form

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: And what is left in the fourth and last?

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's create a button

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: And in the button, I have a register instead of submit

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: But the work will be that it will submit the form

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: I have to write register here

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Let's save and refresh

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So notice that the entire form is ready

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: As we were given the image

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: I can write my first name

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Any random name

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So all the information we gave will be passed

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: F name is equal to John

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: First name is equal to John

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: I have selected female in gender so F is visible

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: I checked in terms of service so it is visible

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So in this way, I can make a form

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: All the information of it goes to get request

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: All the information is displayed in my URL

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So we have to make all the forms in this manner

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So far we have studied many elements in forms

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: And all the important things in forms

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: We have covered them in a way

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: We have to practice these things more

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: We have to solve more assignment questions based on these

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: And we will remember these as much as we use them

text: Next we are going to solve our practice question no. 9 It says recreate the following form with suitable elements and input tags We have read a lot of input types and elements of the form so we have a lot of information and this is a very easy practice question Let's see our form, here some registration form is written on it We can write H1, H2, H3 in any form Let's analyze what are the input types given to us First name is a simple text input Last name is also a simple text input, both are on the same line I know this is a drop down How do I know it is a drop down? Because I can see an arrow here and now we are in drop downs How do we create drop downs in HTML? We do it with the help of select tag and we give different options in it Now here it is written please select gender, so one option is male So let's assume one option will be male, one option will be female, one option we can give others So in this way we can give multiple options in drop down After that what is on the next line? On the next line, do you agree to all terms of service? and here I have a check box So here I know I have to create a check box in the third line and at last I have a button named register So we are using four different types of elements One is text input, one is drop down, one is check box and one is button So we are going to create all of them one by one First of all, we have to write the heading registration form So in our classroom.html file, I am going to delete all the forms that we have written earlier First of all, I am going to make an h3 heading In that we will write registration form So let's save and refresh So registration form is up Now we will create a form Let's create a form Let's define action action is equal to slash action First of all, we are going to create two input elements which will be of text type because I have to take the first and last name as input So I am going to add them in a div First I am going to make input type equals text I have also shown placeholder in this So I am going to add first name in placeholder Let's save and refresh So I have got the first name And because we have already discussed that every input element should have a name attribute So I am going to give it fname which is basically first name In the same way, let's create another input type is equal to text in placeholder Now last name will come Let's save and refresh So we have created the first line Now what we will do in the next div For the drop down, first we will select Let's give it gender Let's give it id also gender And in select we are going to give options This is my first option In first option, male is given In second option, we will make it female In third option, we will make it others And along with that, as there are options So when we will submit data from options, we will not know the value So I have to define a value attribute In which I am going to write m In value attribute, I am going to write f Because value attribute can be small also Now along with that, I have to write some text So for that, let's create a label So for select, I am creating a label For which id? For my gender id What is written in the label? It is written, please select gender Let's save and refresh So please select gender is here In drop down, male is here, female and others can be selected So I have multiple options Now let's see our third line In third line, I have to create a check box So to make a check box, first of all, I will ask my question Do you agree to all terms of service? After that, we will create an input element On which type we are going to write check box Let's give an id Let's give an id And same thing Let's give in its name So my check box is created Let's save and refresh So here is the check box Let's give a label Label for my terms of service Agree Let's write yes I agree Let's save and refresh As soon as I click on yes I agree, it will be checked So in this way, we have completed the third line of our form And what is left in the fourth and last? Let's create a button And in the button, I have a register instead of submit But the work will be that it will submit the form I have to write register here Let's save and refresh So notice that the entire form is ready As we were given the image I can write my first name Any random name So all the information we gave will be passed F name is equal to John First name is equal to John I have selected female in gender so F is visible I checked in terms of service so it is visible So in this way, I can make a form All the information of it goes to get request All the information is displayed in my URL So we have to make all the forms in this manner So far we have studied many elements in forms And all the important things in forms We have covered them in a way We have to practice these things more We have to solve more assignment questions based on these And we will remember these as much as we use them
